name: Schlo Complications
summary:
Follow Drey Gan as his life gets more complicated while living with schlos in schlo complications (part 1 out of 4), an HTML5 kinetic visual novel being released in four parts.

Drey Gan moves into a new house with the Clerences: Slate, Rain, and Shy, and his ex-boyfriend, Jake. Between missing his old relationship with Slate and secretly getting involved with Rain, things start getting complicated!
